channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for PR
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for PR

item.title: Report I-2023080032
item.description:
Report I-2023080032

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-24T18:13:50+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-31
  • City: Carolina
  • State: PR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: DHL EXPRESS (USA), INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On 07/31/2023 shipment was discovered during the shipment inspection process to contain hidden dangerous goods at the DHL SJU service station, 30 Central Sector Rd Caribbean Airport Fac, Carolina, PR 00979. Transportation by road has been confirmed.
